titles.title: The Cross That He Gave (easy awesome)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The cross is not greater than His grace The storm cannot hide His blessed face I am satisfied to know That with Jesus here below I can conquer ev'ry foe{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The cross that He gave may be heavy But it ne'er out weighs His grace The storm that I feared may surround me But it ne'er excludes His face{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The thorns in my path are not sharper Than composed His crown for me The cup that I drink not more bitter Than He drank in Gethsemane{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The light of His love shineth brighter As it falls on paths of woe The toil of my work groweth lighter As I stoop to raise the low{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His will I have joy in fulfilling As I'm walking in His sight My all to the blood I am bringing It alone can keep me right{/lang-eng}
